"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554383d86368724bc4690500#post_554383d86368724bc4690500
[bq="Too_Offensive"]I had a dream that a blimp crashed outside my house and the people riding in it invited me to an art class at a hospital but I couldn't find what floor it was on[/bq]
yep, nothing out of the ordinary here
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55438444636872108b292200#post_55438444636872108b292200
Also Tom nook and one of his kids were on the elevator and I tried to ask them which floor the art class was on but they ran out of the elevator super fast.

also there was an Italian market in the hospital's basement. [/bq]
nope, definitely nothing wrong here
